mapper.select: SELECT tu.user_id AS user_id,tu.nickname AS nickname,tu.pic_url AS pic_url,tu.read_peas AS read_peas,tu.phone AS phone,tu.register_time AS register_time,tr.read_time AS read_time FROM t_user tu RIGHT JOIN t_readme tr ON tu.user_id=tr.reader_id WHERE tu.user_id IN (SELECT reader_id FROM t_readme WHERE author_id=#{userId}) ORDER BY tu.read_peas DESC,tr.read_time DESC
select tra.`article_id`,tra.`read_time` from t_read_article tra left join t_user_article tua on tra.`article_id`=tua.`article_id` where tua.`user_id`=#{authorId} and tra.`reader_id`=#{readerId}
mapper.update: update t_readme set read_count=read_count+1 where reader_id=#{readerId} and author_id=#{authorId}
